settings.text:
TryMoops.com strives to ensure that its services are accessible to people with disabilities. We have invested a significant amount of resources to help ensure that our website is made easier to use and more accessible for people with disabilities, with the strong belief that every person has the right to live with dignity, equality, comfort, and independence.

Accessibility Standards

TryMoops.com aims to comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA, which outline how to make web content more accessible for people with a wide range of disabilities.

Disclaimer

TryMoops.com continues its efforts to constantly improve the accessibility of its site and services in the belief that it is our collective moral obligation to allow seamless, accessible, and unhindered use for those of us with disabilities.

Despite our efforts to make all pages and content on TryMoops.com fully accessible, some content may not yet be fully adapted to the strictest accessibility standards. This may be a result of not having found or identified the most appropriate technological solution.

Here For You

If you are experiencing difficulty with any content on TryMoops.com or require assistance with any part of our site, please contact us during normal business hours as detailed below, and we will be happy to assist.

Response Time

We strive to respond to accessibility feedback within 2 business days and are committed to finding a solution to any accessibility issues promptly.

Contact Us

If you wish to report an accessibility issue, have any questions, or need assistance, please contact Got Moops LLC customer support:

  • Email: sup@trymoops.com
  • Business Hours: 9-5 EST
